str2: Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and leipo; to leave behind; by implication, to forsake.
A keeping of the Sabbath, a Sabbath rest. From a derivative of sabbaton; a 'sabbatism', i.e. the repose of Christianity.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
